resources.string:
This is a simple currency converter app.
 Exchange rates are provided on a daily basis by the European Central Bank.
 If you have available internet connection, you can pick a date up to 90 days before the current date.
 If you are offline, the app will automatically search for the latest rates available on your phone.
 Once you have chosen the date to use, you will be able to decide the currencies and the amount to convert.
